page.title: 08Lifestyles
page.content:
A day in the life of Lisa Hassell aged 11.
I get up at 6.00p.m. when the alarm rings, wash, feed Trixie the dog and then get my breakfast ready,(bacon and egg with toast and a cup of tea). After I have washed up I take the dog for a walk and then get ready for school.After I have wound up my alarm clock I read until 8.40a.m. when I say goodbye to Mum and bike the 2 miles to school with my brother. We play a bit and then go in for register and assembly. We work at things like Mathematics,English and Science until break at 10.30a.m. After break we might do music or write a story and then at 12noon we have our lunch, followed by another play and then we will probably do games or P.E. and finish school with reading and story.
